summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Enhanced Fusion Labs website. All Widget OS and Fusion OS page features working perfectly including interactive watch simulator, theme switching, hardware specs, documentation access, and firmware files.
passed_tests: Widget OS page loads with all hardware specifications for both boards (1.8" WOS-180A and 2.06" WOS-206A)
Core features section displays all 6 features (Custom Watch Faces, WiFi, Smart Power, SD Storage, Activity, LVGL)
Internet Features section shows Weather, Stocks, Currency with API details
Built-in Apps grid displays all 8 apps (Clock, Compass, Timer, Torch, Games, Media, Gallery, System)
SD Card Structure section shows complete folder tree with /WATCH/ hierarchy
Firmware update links for both board sizes are functional
Fusion OS page interactive watch simulator working with real-time display
Theme switching buttons work for all 3 themes (Luffy Gear 5, Sung Jin-Woo, Yugo Wakfu)
Watch menu toggle functionality working (click watch bar to toggle menu)
Character Themes section displays all 3 character paths with progression details
RPG Features section shows all 6 features with descriptions
Development Status section displays progress bars for all 6 categories
GitHub links point to correct repository (https://github.com/ithig124-hub/ESP32_Watch)
Firmware JSON files accessible for both boards (/firmware/widget-os/180A/latest.json and /firmware/widget-os/206A/latest.json)
Back navigation from pages to home working
Notification form on Fusion OS page functional
All buttons and interactive elements clickable and responsive
